DOC.brief_summary: A randomised study compare Transanal Haemorrhoidal Dearterialization ( THD ) Open Haemorrhoidectomy ( OH ) treatment prolapse haemorrhoid . The primary aim study evaluate long-term effect haemorrhoidal symptoms one year postoperatively . Secondary endpoint postoperative pain , complication , effect anal continence , recovery return normal activity , quality life health cost analysis .
